transcript_chunks.text: we got to have a conversation about the sauce situation can we talk about the sauce situation dude I can't [ __ ] believe how much money they're charging you for these sauces why are we so stingy cents per sauce I ordered a double cheeseburger fries and six piece nugget they gave me one sauce are you [ __ ] kidding me are you [ __ ] kidding me you used to shove your hand in the sauce box throw them in the bag that's what it should be throw them in the bag last time I went to McDonald's I ordered I said let me get the hot mustard cuz I like the hot mustard not the honey mustard people don't know about the hot mustard she gives me honey mustard I said hey ma' I'm so sorry I ordered the hot mustard she said 25 cents I said no you don't no no no you [ __ ] up you [ __ ] up you give me that hot mustard you give me that hot mustard hot mustard get it dude you ordered 20 McNuggets they only give you three sauces I'm at the drive I'm at the drive you're trying to get me to give you 25 cents

mustard you give me that hot mustard hot mustard get it dude you ordered 20 McNuggets they only give you three sauces I'm at the drive I'm at the drive you're trying to get me to give you 25 cents you want another interaction right now just give me the hot mustard it's faster
